ComicInfo.Summary:
With traitorous blood on her hands, Belladonna now must face the wrath of all three Furies at once! Series artist Nahuel Lopez delivers his most luscious women and vicious battles ever!
Available with these sexy covers: Regular (and Nude), Viking Vixen (and Nude) by Lopez - Shield Maiden (and Nude) by Matt Martin - Stunning (and Nude)and Killer Body (and Nude) by Renato Camilo - Wraparound (and Nude) by Raulo Caceres - a special set of six Bath Time covers by Christian Zanier and a set of three Wetworks nude covers by Christian Zanier - and a Fifty Shades Nude by Camilo that is limited to just 50 copies!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 1 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Raulo Caceres | 2 | BTC | Bath Time Cover | Christian Zanier | 3 | SC | Stunning Cover | Renato Camilo | 4 | SHC | Shield Maiden Cover | Matt Martin | 5 | WAC | Wetworks Adult Cover | Christian Zanier | 6 | BTTC | Bath Time Topless Cover | Christian Zanier | 7 | KBNC | Killer Body Nude Cover | Renato Camilo | 8 | SNC | Stunning Nude Cover | Renato Camilo | 9 | WSNC | Wetworks Splatter Nude Cover | Christian Zanier | 10 | FSNC | Fifty Shades Nude Cover, Limited to 50 | Renato Camilo | 11 | VVC | Viking Vixen Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 12 | KBC | Killer Body Cover | Renato Camilo | 13 | WNC | Wetworks Nude Cover | Christian Zanier | 14 | BTNC | Bath Time Nude Cover | Christian Zanier | 15 | SMNC | Shield Maiden Nude Cover | Matt Martin | 16 | BTAC | Bath Time Adult Cover | Christian Zanier | 17 | VVNC | Viking Vixen Nude Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 18 | BTACC | Bath Time Adult Cleanse Cover | Christian Zanier | 19 | WNC | Wraparound Nude Cover | Raulo Caceres | 20 | BTARCC | Bath Time Adult Rear Cleanse Cover | Christian Zanier | 21 | NC | Nude Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 22 |
